title: 5.2 Master Challenge 2
question:
Create an Excel worksheet with reference to the following screenshot. Perform the operations on the data as listed below

1. Collect the data from your friends or siblings.
2. Prepare an Excel worksheet using the gathered data.
3. Resize all the columns.
4. Interchange the positions of columns B and C using the following methods:
a. Clipboard options
b. Dragging and moving the column position
5. Freeze the top row of the worksheet
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
